plot: Sargent Bellows pays a visit to Bobo, Ganto and Claude to borrow a cup of sugar so he can bake Snicker-doodles, like his Grandma used to make. Bobo almost gives Sarge the sugar when his helmet goes on the fritz and things go haywire.
plot_en: Sargent Bellows pays a visit to Bobo, Ganto and Claude to borrow a cup of sugar so he can bake Snicker-doodles, like his Grandma used to make. Bobo almost gives Sarge the sugar when his helmet goes on the fritz and things go haywire.
plot_es: Sargent Bellows pays a visit to Bobo, Ganto and Claude to borrow a cup of sugar so he can bake Snicker-doodles, like his Grandma used to make. Bobo almost gives Sarge the sugar when his helmet goes on the fritz and things go haywire.
title: Gorillaville
